CustomProperties.Name: HeaderTextColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color of the text displayed on the header

CustomProperties.Name: HeaderFontSize
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The font size used to display text in the header

CustomProperties.Name: ResetHeader
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether the header and its elements should be reset

CustomProperties.Name: UserIsDeveloper
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Determines whether certain hidden elements should be shown

CustomProperties.Name: ShowBackButton
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether a back button is displayed on the header

CustomProperties.Name: BackRedirectTo
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Where the header should redirect the user when the back button is pressed
